data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Bahoruco, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bahoruco, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 9,918 believers in Bahoruco to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Over 6.21 percent of the people of Bahoruco are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, we ask for 18 new simple churches in the state of Bahoruco, Dominican Republic. Place a simple church in every community of the 91,500 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Japanese people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Japanese people.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Bahoruco, Dominican Republic to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Bahoruco.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 9,918 believers in Bahoruco, Dominican Republic to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

location.name: Bahoruco
location.cities_list: Neiba, Villa Jaragua, Galván, Los Ríos
location.cities_list_w_pop: Neiba (18,670), Villa Jaragua (9,248), Galván (6,027), Los Ríos (4,440)
